attributes.action: Legalise and tax cannabis products and give 100% of the profit to the NHS
attributes.additional_details: To save the NHS and to save thousands of police hours,wasted millions of pounds on enforcing prohibition of a substance the rest of the world is legalising
attributes.background: The cannabis market needs  regulating, decriminalise it,tax it and give all the profits to the NHS

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions, which call for similar actions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640608
Full legalisation and taxation of cannabis for medical and recreation use

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638253
Legalise cannabis and expunge previous convictions for possession
